multipleUrls.question: Can you test multiple URLs at once?
multipleUrls.answer: Absolutely! Log in to your account to test multiple URLs simultaneously. You can even import from Google Docs or your API, and we'll handle daily tests for you. Stay informed with notifications when an affiliate URL breaks or presents new opportunities.

whatIs.title: What is the Affiliate Link Checker?
whatIs.description: This tool is essential for affiliate marketers who want to ensure their links are functioning correctly and driving traffic as intended. By quickly identifying issues like broken links or unauthorized redirects, you can take immediate action to optimize your affiliate campaigns. Additionally, this tool helps you uncover hidden relationships within affiliate networks, giving you greater control and transparency over your partnerships. Make sure your affiliate links are working to their full potential by regularly checking them with this tool.

howItWorks.title: How does the Link checker work?
howItWorks.description: You can gain valuable insights into your affiliate links' journey. We track every redirect and intermediary step to provide you with a clear picture of how your links are performing. This helps you identify any potential issues, such as unexpected redirects or unauthorized changes, ensuring your affiliate campaigns are as effective and transparent as possible.

differentNetwork.title: What actions are recommended if my link ends up on a different network?
differentNetwork.description: Subnetworks or subprograms are networks or programs that leverage the offerings of other networks, promoting them on their own platforms. While there's nothing inherently wrong with this practice, it could mean you're leaving money on the table. Learn more about sub-affiliate networks.

programLeasing.title: How can program leasing lead to potential issues in affiliate marketing?
programLeasing.description: Common issues associated with subnetworks include link tracking problems, lost sales, and delays in payments. Additionally, since subnetworks need to generate their own revenue, the mechanics of a program can often differ from the original. This can result in shorter cookie periods, lower commission rates, and other changes that might reduce your overall earnings. It's important to be aware of these potential pitfalls to ensure you're maximizing your affiliate marketing efforts and not missing out on potential income.

affiliateEarningsCalculator.title: Affiliate Earnings Calculator
affiliateEarningsCalculator.description: Estimate your potential affiliate earnings based on your website's performance metrics.

pageviews.title: The number of pageviews your website receives per month.
pageviews.description: This metric is crucial for estimating your potential affiliate earnings as it represents your overall traffic.

ctr.title: The percentage of visitors who click on your affiliate links.
ctr.description: A higher CTR indicates more effective placement and presentation of your affiliate links.

conversionRate.title: The percentage of visitors who make a purchase after clicking your affiliate link.
conversionRate.description: This rate reflects how well the products you're promoting match your audience's interests and needs.

commissionRate.title: The percentage of the sale value you earn as commission.
commissionRate.description: Higher commission rates directly increase your earnings per sale, but may vary depending on the affiliate program and product type.

averageOrderValue.title: The average value of orders made through your affiliate links.
averageOrderValue.description: Higher average order values can significantly boost your earnings, especially when combined with a good commission rate.

costPerVisitor.title: The average cost to acquire a single visitor to your website.
costPerVisitor.description: This helps calculate the ROI of your affiliate marketing efforts.

returnVisitorRate.title: The percentage of visitors who return to your site.
returnVisitorRate.description: A higher rate can indicate strong content and user engagement.

averageLifetimeValue.title: The total revenue you expect to earn from a customer over their lifetime.
averageLifetimeValue.description: This helps in understanding the long-term value of your affiliate efforts.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: The affiliate earnings calculator uses the following formula:
howItWorks.formula: Earnings = Pageviews × CTR × Conversion Rate × Commission Rate × Average Order Value
howItWorks.explanation: This calculation provides an estimate of your potential earnings based on the input parameters. Keep in mind that actual results may vary due to factors such as seasonality, product popularity, and market conditions.

tips.title: Tips to Increase Your Affiliate Earnings
items: Improve your content quality to attract more visitors
Optimize your CTR by using compelling call-to-action buttons and product images
Choose high-converting products that align with your audience's interests
Negotiate higher commission rates with your affiliate partners
Focus on promoting products with higher average order values

negotiating.title: Negotiating Higher Commissions
negotiating.paragraph1: When approaching affiliate managers with a media kit, you might hear that they have no budget for branding or extra exposure packages. However, they often have the flexibility to offer increased commission rates.
negotiating.paragraph2: Use the calculator above to demonstrate the potential increase in revenue from a higher commission rate. This data-driven approach can be a powerful negotiation tool.
negotiating.paragraph3: For example, if you currently earn a 4% commission and negotiate an increase to 6%:
negotiating.paragraph4: This significant increase in earnings can be a compelling argument for both you and the affiliate manager, as it incentivizes you to drive more sales without requiring additional budget allocation from their end.

referralQrCodeGenerator.title: Generate Your Referral QR Code for Free!
referralQrCodeGenerator.description: Create a custom QR code for your referral link. Customize colors, size, and add a logo to make it stand out! We even let you download it for free! Or login and use our API to generate QR codes programmatically.

download.apiInfo: Need to generate QR codes programmatically? Every Affensus package includes a free API to generate QR codes on the fly!

whatIs.title: What is the Referral QR Code Generator?
whatIs.description: Our Referral QR Code Generator is a powerful tool designed to help you create custom QR codes for your referral links. With this tool, you can easily generate QR codes that are both functional and visually appealing, making it easier for your audience to access your referral links.

howItWorks.title: How does the QR Code Generator work?
howItWorks.description: Simply input your referral URL, and our tool will generate a QR code instantly. You can then customize various aspects of the QR code, including its size, colors, and even add a logo or image to make it more branded and recognizable.

whyUse.title: Why use QR codes for referrals?
whyUse.description: QR codes provide a quick and easy way for people to access your referral links, especially in physical or offline contexts. They can be added to business cards, flyers, posters, or any other marketing material, bridging the gap between offline and online marketing efforts.

affiliateNetworkUptime.title: Network Uptime Reporting
affiliateNetworkUptime.description: We monitor affiliate networks every 1 minute, ensuring the key tracking links are operational.
affiliateNetworkUptime.emailNotifications: Get notified of any outages via email.

messages.noDataAvailable: Can't find your network? Let us know the network you want to add by sending an email to info@affensus.com
messages.configuring: Uptime monitoring is being configured and will be available soon.
messages.error: An error occurred while processing your request.

whatDoesItTrack.title: What does our Uptime Monitor track?
whatDoesItTrack.description: Our Uptime Monitor tracks the crucial tracking links of affiliate networks. We continuously check these elements every 1 minute to ensure your affiliate operations run smoothly.

coloredBars.title: What do the colored bars represent?
coloredBars.description: Green bars indicate optimal performance (99.9% uptime or higher), orange bars show potential issues (97-99.8% uptime), and red bars signal critical problems (below 97% uptime). The heartbeat bars show real-time status updates from our monitoring system.

fiveNines.title: What does 99.999% uptime mean?
fiveNines.description: 99.999% uptime, often called "five nines," means the service is available 99.999% of the time. This translates to only 5.26 minutes of downtime per year, indicating exceptional reliability. For affiliate networks, this level of uptime is crucial to maximize earnings and maintain user trust.

checkFrequency.title: How often do we check for uptime?
checkFrequency.description: We perform checks every 1 minute, providing near real-time monitoring of your affiliate network's performance. This frequent monitoring allows for quick detection and response to any issues that may arise.

downtimeActions.title: What actions should I take if downtime is detected?
downtimeActions.description: When significant downtime is detected, we recommend: 1) Verifying the issue on your end, 2) Contacting the affiliate network's support team, 3) Temporarily pausing any active campaigns, and 4) Keeping your affiliates informed about the situation. Our system provides automated alerts to help you respond quickly to any disruptions.

customNetworks.title: Can I add a custom network if I can't find my network?
customNetworks.description: Yes we can add custom networks for you. Just drop us an email at info@affensus.com and we will add any network you like.
